lead_paragraph: HAINES--Daniel W.,died January 11, 2016, age 78. Husband of Brynne, father of Gordon and Laurel, retired Professor of Engineering at Manhattan College and University of South Carolina. Greatly interested in music, substitutes for wood in musical instruments, history of New Jersey and of White Plains, NY. Consider donations to ALS Association - Greater NY Chapter. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  HAINES, DANIEL W.

snippet: HAINES--Daniel W.,died January 11, 2016, age 78. Husband of Brynne, father of Gordon and Laurel, retired Professor of Engineering at Manhattan College and University of South Carolina.
